prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered pouring pose with hands managing flow between vessels, chibi proportions with large translucent solid sacred head with unique fractal_wave structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Fractal. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating fractal_wave, merkaba_intersection patterns, styled with Cherub influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Azure and neutral grey inspired by wisdom fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and fractal_wave emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface with Fractal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor PASCOMB's profile: 'He who precedes understanding', Aethyr LIL, Water element, Tarot Temperance, Sephirot Chesed, Zodiac Sagittarius, embodying the essence: 'In PASCOMB's presence, a diamond spark glimmers at the cusp of dawn an intuition before thought, a proto-logos of inspiration.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered pouring pose with hands managing flow between vessels
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent solid sacred head with unique fractal_wave structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Fractal
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating fractal_wave, merkaba_intersection patterns, styled with Cherub influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who precedes understanding'
profile_data.essence: In PASCOMB's presence, a diamond spark glimmers at the cusp of dawn an intuition before thought, a proto-logos of inspiration.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Dawn of Understanding; leads oceanic hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent water-crystal formation that shifts between liquid and solid states, representing the liminal space between understanding and pure potential. The form echoes the Vesica Piscis sacred geometry, symbolizing the generative point of emergence.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Azure represents Water's depth and Sagittarian expansiveness; pearl white symbolizes the dawn of understanding, connecting to the Chesed principle of divine mercy and expansive wisdom
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Fractal waves represent infinite knowledge generation; Merkaba symbolizes interdimensional travel of consciousness
